name: Duane-Radial Ray Syndrome

slit-like opening of the exterior auditory meatus

Scleroderma, Familial Progressive

name: Dermatomyositis
HOP_symptoms: diffuse reticular or finely nodular infiltrations

name: Cinca Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: delayed closure of the anterior fontanelle

name: Menkes Disease
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the abdominal wall musculature

name: Proteus Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies

name: Chromosome 16p13.3 Deletion Syndrome, Proximal
HOP_symptoms: malformation of the heart and great vessels

name: Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome, Vascular Type

name: Hemifacial Microsomia

name: Coffin-Siris Syndrome 1
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger

name: Cryoglobulinemia, Familial Mixed
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of blood and blood-forming tissues

name: Chylomicron Retention Disease
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of blood and blood-forming tissues

name: Mannosidosis, Beta a, Lysosomal
HOP_symptoms: hypoplasia of the abdominal wall musculature

name: Familial Hypocalciuric Hypercalcemia
HOP_symptoms: parathormone-independent increased renal tubular calcium reabsorption
reduced ratio of renal calcium clearance to creatinine clearance

name: Schimke Immunoosseous Dysplasia
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies
hypoplasia of the capital femoral epiphysis
lateral displacement of the femoral head

name: Amegakaryocytic Thrombocytopenia, Congenital
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies

name: Frontotemporal Dementia and/or Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis 1
HOP_symptoms: degeneration of the lateral corticospinal tracts
neuronal loss in the cerebral cortex
neuronal loss in central nervous system
weakness due to upper motor neuron dysfunction

name: Insensitivity to Pain, Congenital, with Anhidrosis
HOP_symptoms: decreased number of small peripheral myelinated nerve fibers

name: Ulnar-Mammary Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: aplasia of the pectoralis major muscle

name: Simpson-Golabi-Behmel Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the abdominal wall musculature

name: Ossification of the Posterior Longitudinal Ligament of Spine
Mental Retardation, Autosomal Dominant 20
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of the periventricular white matter

name: Mental Retardation, X-Linked, Syndromic 13
HOP_symptoms: focal eeg discharges with secondary generalization
abnormal aggressive, impulsive or violent behavior

name: Hypocalciuric Hypercalcemia, Familial, Type Iii
HOP_symptoms: parathormone-independent increased renal tubular calcium reabsorption

name: Coffin-Siris Syndrome 4
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the distal phalanges of the hand

name: Pigmentary Disorder, Reticulate, with Systemic Manifestations, X-Linked
